接口 org.apache.giraph.aggregators.AggregatorUsage
的使用

  • 使用AggregatorUsage的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.giraph.benchmark
    Package of benchmarks for performance testing and optimization
    org.apache.giraph.graph
    Package of all the graph related objects, built on the org.apache.bsp package.
    org.apache.giraph.master
    Package of all the master related things.
    org.apache.giraph.worker
    Package of all the worker related things

    • org.apache.giraph.benchmark中AggregatorUsage的使用

      实现AggregatorUsage的org.apache.giraph.benchmark中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  AggregatorsBenchmark.AggregatorsBenchmarkMasterCompute
      MasterCompute class for AggregatorsBenchmark
      static class  AggregatorsBenchmark.AggregatorsBenchmarkVertex
      Vertex class for AggregatorsBenchmark
      static class  AggregatorsBenchmark.AggregatorsBenchmarkWorkerContext
      WorkerContext class for AggregatorsBenchmark
      class  PageRankVertex
      Implementation of PageRank in which vertex ids are ints, page rank values are floats, and graph is unweighted.
      static class  RandomMessageBenchmark.RandomMessageBenchmarkMasterCompute
      Master compute associated with RandomMessageBenchmark.
      static class  RandomMessageBenchmark.RandomMessageBenchmarkWorkerContext
      WorkerContext forRandomMessageBenchmark.
      static class  RandomMessageBenchmark.RandomMessageVertex
      Actual message computation (messaging in this case)
      class  ShortestPathsVertex
      Shortest paths algorithm.
      class  WeightedPageRankVertex
      Implementation of Page Rank algorithm on a weighted graph.

      Basic abstract class for writing a BSP application for computation.

    • org.apache.giraph.master中AggregatorUsage的使用

      org.apache.giraph.master中AggregatorUsage的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  MasterAggregatorUsage
      Master compute can access and change aggregators through this interface
      实现AggregatorUsage的org.apache.giraph.master中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultMasterCompute
      A dumb implementation of MasterCompute.
      class  MasterAggregatorHandler
      Handler for aggregators on master
      class  MasterCompute
      Interface for defining a master vertex that can perform centralized computation between supersteps.

    • org.apache.giraph.worker中AggregatorUsage的使用

      org.apache.giraph.worker中AggregatorUsage的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  WorkerAggregatorUsage
      Vertex classes can access and change aggregators through this interface
      interface  WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
      WorkerAggregatorUsage which can be used in each of the computation threads.
      实现AggregatorUsage的org.apache.giraph.worker中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultWorkerContext
      A dummy implementation of WorkerContext.
      class  WorkerAggregatorHandler
      Handler for aggregators on worker.
      class  WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage
      Not thread-safe implementation of WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage.
      class  WorkerContext
      WorkerContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-worker basis.
